name: Infernoble Knight Emperor Charles
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If a monster(s) on the field becomes equipped with an Equip Card, even during the Damage Step: You can destroy 1 card on the field. During the End Phase: You can equip 1 Equip Spell from your hand or GY to this card, then you can equip 1 FIRE Warrior monster from your Deck to this card as an Equip Spell that makes it gain 500 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Infernoble Knight Emperor Charles" once per turn.
